about_the_game:
Become a leader and support your troops!


Get access to two exclusive units, not included in the Premium subscription!

  • Non-Commissioned Officer (NCO): you carry a SMG and can build some extra defensive fortifications, among which an ammunition crater (player-placed object resupplying any unit standing close)
  • Ammunition Bearer: you carry 4 ammo boxes that will resupply all primary and secondary weapons of infantries
  • You can volunteer as a brigade commander (AO/DO): join a brigade and type .oicvolunteer in the chat

Upon purchase, these units will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available at the spawn you have selected.

This downloadable content may be purchased without requiring a subscription. You will pay for the DLC one time and you will own that content indefinitely.
At any time, you can subscribe to gain full access but should you choose to unsubscribe, these DLC items will remain with your account, always.
detailed_description:
Become a leader and support your troops!


Get access to two exclusive units, not included in the Premium subscription!

  • Non-Commissioned Officer (NCO): you carry a SMG and can build some extra defensive fortifications, among which an ammunition crater (player-placed object resupplying any unit standing close)
  • Ammunition Bearer: you carry 4 ammo boxes that will resupply all primary and secondary weapons of infantries
  • You can volunteer as a brigade commander (AO/DO): join a brigade and type .oicvolunteer in the chat

Upon purchase, these units will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available at the spawn you have selected.

This downloadable content may be purchased without requiring a subscription. You will pay for the DLC one time and you will own that content indefinitely.
At any time, you can subscribe to gain full access but should you choose to unsubscribe, these DLC items will remain with your account, always.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Processor: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12.2+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

name: Leadership Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

short_description: Become a leader of WWII Online and get exclusive access to the NCO class and the Ammo bearer!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
